alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 10:39AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alameda, southeastern Contra Costa and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 1130 AM PST... At 1039 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunol-Midtown, or near San Jose, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, Livermore, Pleasanton, Milpitas, Cupertino, Dublin, Newark, Campbell, Los Gatos, Alum Rock, Sunol, Mt. Hamilton, East Foothills, Sunol-Midtown, Fruitdale, Seven Trees and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
